name: life is short (shava59)
description:
life is short.

so       very         short.

--------------------------------

Life is Short is a game I made for the Blackthornprod Game Jam #3. The theme of the jam was: "Less is more". So I made a game that is very short (only about 2-3 minutes long), has 2 endings, and carries a message with it.

I hope you like this game, and thanks for playing if you did!   :)
